chapter.para: &PRODUCTABBR; uses a data interchange schema that corresponds to the Ed-Fi v1.0.03 schema. However, &COMPANYABBR; has modified this schema using schema extensions and restrictions. To make sure that your data can be ingested, please make sure it conforms to the Ed-Fi v1.0.03 schema as well as the &PRODUCTABBR; extension schema.
You can download the &PRODUCTABBR; extension schema at: SLI Extension Schema.

caution.para: The term "schema" is used to describe both the interchange schema for ingestion and the database schema for the &COMPANYABBR; Data Store. The REST API interacts with data based on the schema in the data store, not the interchange schema. Version numbers of these schemas may not be synchronized. See developer documentation for more information about the API and data store.
